languages.text: "Я путешествую с Паскалем уже какое-то время и готов{mf||а} поклясться, что он — не преступник".
"Pasqal has accompanied me on my travels for a while now, and I can swear to it that he is no criminal."
languages.original_text: "Я путешествую с Паскалем уже какое-то время и готов{mf||а} поклясться, что он — не преступник".

traits.locale_text: "Pasqal has accompanied me on my travels for a while now, and I can swear to it that he is no criminal."
"Pasqal has accompanied me on my travels for a while now, and I can swear to it that he is no criminal."
"Pasqal has accompanied me on my travels for a while now, and I can swear to it that he is no criminal."
"Pasqal has accompanied me on my travels for a while now, and I can swear to it that he is no criminal."
"Pasqal has accompanied me on my travels for a while now, and I can swear to it that he is no criminal."
"Pasqal has accompanied me on my travels for a while now, and I can swear to it that he is no criminal."

languages.text: 「パスカルとはしばらくの間、一緒に旅している。誓って言えるが、彼は犯罪者などではない」
languages.original_text: "Pasqal has accompanied me on my travels for a while now, and I can swear to it that he is no criminal."

traits.locale_text: 「パスカルとはしばらくの間、一緒に旅している。誓って言えるが、彼は犯罪者などではない」

languages.text: “帕斯卡已经与我同行很长时间了，我可以发誓他绝不是罪犯。”
languages.original_text: "Pasqal has accompanied me on my travels for a while now, and I can swear to it that he is no criminal."

traits.locale_text: “帕斯卡已经与我同行很长时间了，我可以发誓他绝不是罪犯。”

languages.text: "Pasqal begleitet mich nun schon eine Weile auf meinen Reisen, und ich kann beschwören, dass er kein Krimineller ist."
languages.original_text: "Pasqal has accompanied me on my travels for a while now, and I can swear to it that he is no criminal."

traits.locale_text: "Pasqal begleitet mich nun schon eine Weile auf meinen Reisen, und ich kann beschwören, dass er kein Krimineller ist."

languages.text: « Cela fait un bon moment que Pasqal m'accompagne dans mes voyages, et je peux vous assurer qu'il n'a rien à se reprocher. »
languages.original_text: "Pasqal has accompanied me on my travels for a while now, and I can swear to it that he is no criminal."

traits.locale_text: « Cela fait un bon moment que Pasqal m'accompagne dans mes voyages, et je peux vous assurer qu'il n'a rien à se reprocher. »

languages.text: «Pasqal lleva ya una temporada acompañándome en mis viajes, y le juro por mi honor que no es ningún delincuente».
languages.original_text: "Pasqal has accompanied me on my travels for a while now, and I can swear to it that he is no criminal."

traits.locale_text: «Pasqal lleva ya una temporada acompañándome en mis viajes, y le juro por mi honor que no es ningún delincuente».

languages.text: "Pasqal, yolculuklarımda uzun süredir bana eşlik ediyor. Yemin ederim ki o suçlu değil."
languages.original_text: "Pasqal has accompanied me on my travels for a while now, and I can swear to it that he is no criminal."

traits.locale_text: "Pasqal yolculuklarımda uzun süredir bana eşlik ediyor ve yemin ederim ki o bir suçlu değildir."
